
An impatient developer reused a nonce while signing messages to launch a token. Recover the private key using the ECDSA signatures: Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493fe747a76913f7c606457271e775ceacbc51feb8bb0ae7333a29ef6097216d58e2

## Challenge Technical Details
